items.name: Heimdall Lite
items.desc: A lightweight version of Heimdall for simple use cases

items.name: Heimdall Server
items.desc: The complete Heimdall application - store results, coordinate across the development team, and more

items.name: Vulcan (alpha)
items.desc: Application for streamlining InSpec profile and overlay development using the Security Requirements Guide (SRG)

items.name: InSpec_Tools
items.desc: A set of Ruby utilities for creating, converting, and processing security baseline formats, results, and data

items.name: Heimdall_Tools
items.desc: A set of Ruby utilities for converting and working with compliance data for use in Heimdall apps

items.name: InSpecJS
items.desc: A Typescript library for working with InSpec data

items.name: InSpecJS_Tools
items.desc: A set of JavaScript utilities for creating, converting, and processing security baseline formats, results, and data

items.name: HDF Splunk Plugin
items.desc: Splunk plugin to upload Inspec output, Heimdall Tools output, and any other HDF format files to Splunk, for consumption by Heimdall Lite

items.name: HeimdallJS_Tools (Coming Soon!)
items.desc: A set of JavaScript utilities for converting and working with compliance data for use in Heimdall apps
